summary: In British India, a young prince must be taken to safey across rebel-held territory, and an old train is the only way to do it.
cast: Kenneth More|Lauren Bacall|Herbert Lom|Wilfrid Hyde-White|I.S. Johar|Ursula Jeans|Eugene Deckers|Ian Hunter|Jack Gwillim|Govind Raja Ross|Basil Hoskins|S.M. Asgaralli|Sam Chowdhary|Moultrie Kelsall|Lionel Murton|Jaron Yaltan|Homi Bode|Frank Olegario|Ronald Cardew|Allan Cuthbertson|Howard Marion-Crawford|Irmgard Spoliansky
title: La India en llamas
